questions.question: What Google metric measures page experience?
questions.explanation: Core Web Vitals assess loading, interactivity, and stability.

questions.question: What markup helps search engines display rich results?
What algorithm update penalizes low-quality content?
questions.explanation: Panda targets thin or duplicate content.

questions.question: What measures content indexability?
questions.explanation: Crawl budget limits pages crawled per site.

questions.question: What identifies search intent categories?
questions.explanation: Intent classifies informational, navigational, or transactional searches.

questions.question: What link attribute prevents authority transfer?
questions.explanation: nofollow tells crawlers not to follow links.

questions.question: What measures page relevance through links?
